availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lucy C. Cropper Beal (Carroll County and Henry County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Carroll County and Henry County, Kentucky, resident. Henry County, Kentucky, native. Daughter of John D. Cropper and Parthena Cropper. Married to John P. Beal in Carroll County, Kentucky, on January 25, 1853. Mother of of Zimena Beal, Pheletus Beal, Ella Beal, and Joseph Beal. Resident of Carroll County in 1850. Resident of Henry County in 1860. Resident of Carroll County in 1862. Resident of Carroll County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District 1, p. 187A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Port Royal, p. 36.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Carrolton, p.21B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records - Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994030, Carroll County Marriages.
